meanings.definition: The quality or state of being vertical.
meanings.sent1: The tall building's verticalness made it stand out in the city skyline.
meanings.sent2: The verticalness of the tree trunk allowed the squirrel to climb easily.
meanings.sent3: The verticalness of the bookshelf made it look like a ladder to the curious cat.
meanings.sent4: The verticalness of the waterfall created a mesmerizing sight for the hikers.
meanings.sent5: The verticalness of the flagpole made it visible from far away.

meanings.definition: The condition of forming an angle of 90 degrees with a horizontal line or plane.
meanings.sent1: The verticalness of the corner of the room was perfect for placing a bookshelf.
meanings.sent2: The verticalness of the street sign made it easy to read from a distance.
meanings.sent3: The verticalness of the ruler on the desk seemed to challenge the laws of physics.
meanings.sent4: The verticalness of the skyscraper against the clear sky was a symbol of human achievement.
meanings.sent5: The verticalness of the mountain peak against the horizon was breathtaking.
